video.title: The F.B.I. Files
video.synopsis: FBI agents across the United States perform daring feats to bring society's most lethal and ruthless criminals to justice.

seasons.title: The Best of the F.B.I. Files

episodes.synopsis: When a wealthy man's 13-year-old daughter is kidnapped on her way to school, the father will pay and do anything to get her back.
episodes.title: Held for Ransom

episodes.synopsis: When the small community of Noel, Missouri's bank is robbed they're shocked, but the truth proves more terrifying than they could have guessed.
episodes.title: Blood Brothers

episodes.synopsis: In the search for the killer of a young mother shot dead in front of her two young boys, investigators find a web of money and drugs.
episodes.title: Deadly Secrets

episodes.synopsis: In the 1970s and '80s, people went to Alaska looking to disappear for a while, but many became the prey of serial killer Robert Hansen.
episodes.title: Hunter's Game

episodes.synopsis: The calm of a Southern Ohio's quiet community is shattered when a madman with a high-powered rifle hunts humans along country roads.
episodes.title: Human Prey

episodes.synopsis: Investigators have their work cut out for them when they hunt a serial rapist and murderer who follows a path so random it's impossible to trace.
episodes.title: Driven To Kill

episodes.synopsis: After two criminals escape authorities during a routine transport, they cross the country in a wave of car theft, abduction and murder.
episodes.title: Unlawful Flight

episodes.synopsis: When three people, including an eight-year-old boy, are murdered at home, it appears to be a burglary gone awry, but investigators take a closer look.
episodes.title: Hired Gun

episodes.synopsis: In 1984, some aspiring models began attracting publicity in a terrible new way, as victims of serial rapist and killer Christopher Wilder.
episodes.title: A Model Killer

episodes.synopsis: When an unidentified young runaway turns up murdered on the side of the road, it's only the persistence of the police and F.B.I. that find her killer.
episodes.title: A Stranger in Town

episodes.synopsis: When a family is murdered in Arkansas, it seems like an isolated incident, but it's soon clear that it's part of a new age of domestic terrorism.
episodes.title: Deadly Mission

episodes.synopsis: Investigators search for a serial killer who charms, then kills, young women and always seems to stay one step ahead of the police.
episodes.title: Deadly Trail

episodes.synopsis: When Captain Shirley Russell fails to show up for duty and her colleagues refuse to believe she went AWOL, an intense investigation begins.
episodes.title: Dishonored

episodes.synopsis: When a 12-year-old girl is abducted, the F.B.I. knows to act fast, search wide and enlist volunteers, but they also know that time is against them.
episodes.title: When Seconds Count

episodes.synopsis: Wily trapper Claude Dallas lives like he is still in the Old West, but when he shoots two game wardens the F.B.I. must bring him to justice.
episodes.title: The Murdering Cowboy

episodes.synopsis: Serial killer Larry Gene Bell was a predator, abducting girls and young women from their own front yards and then taunting the families by phone.
episodes.title: Cat and Mouse

episodes.synopsis: When a judge and his politician wife are murdered in their home, the F.B.I. refuses to give up looking for the killer, despite the lack of clues.
episodes.title: The Dixie Mafia

episodes.synopsis: When an eight-year-old girl is snatched during her bike ride to a corner mailbox, the F.B.I. suspects a drifter who is out of prison on parole.
episodes.title: The Predator

episodes.synopsis: After the body of a suspected drug courier is found burning in an alley, the F.B.I. works with local police to go after a vicious drug lord.
episodes.title: No Remorse

episodes.synopsis: When five-year-old Melissa Brannen disappears at a holiday party, the F.B.I. think they know who did it, but they need the girl's body to prosecute.
episodes.title: Melissa Brannen: Missing

episodes.synopsis: When the driver of an armored vehicle is murdered and its cargo of a million dollars is taken, the trail leads back to unexpected suspects.
episodes.title: Silent Strike

episodes.synopsis: A masked bank robber avoids detection, alarms and exploding dye packs during a daytime heist, sending the F.B.I. on a four-year manhunt.
episodes.title: Terror In Disguise

episodes.synopsis: When 10-year-old Scotty Baker is reported missing from his school in Kentucky, police look close to home for the culprit.
episodes.title: Betrayed

episodes.synopsis: The F.B.I. try to catch a seemingly unstoppable gang of bank robbers that targets banks and armored cars in broad daylight with assault weapons.
episodes.title: Firefight

episodes.synopsis: For former Deputy Attorney General for the State of Delaware, losing sight of his sworn oath to uphold justice could prove lethal.
episodes.title: Deadly Obsession

episodes.synopsis: Investigators hunt a terrorist who fires into rush hour traffic in Langley, Virginia, targeting employees of the Central Intelligence Agency.
episodes.title: Global Pursuit

episodes.synopsis: After Polly Klaas is kidnapped from her own slumber party, 200 F.B.I. agents search for months to find her abductor and murderer.
episodes.title: Polly Klaas: Kidnapped

episodes.synopsis: When a young African-American man is found decapitated, the case becomes even more bizarre when investigators discover he was in a religious cult.
episodes.title: Temple of Fear

episodes.synopsis: The F.B.I. searches for a seven-year-old girl who was taken from her family camp site in Montana by a kidnapper who left no clues.
episodes.title: Dark Woods

episodes.synopsis: Fewer than 10 percent of the thousand-plus hunting accidents each year are fatal, but this hunter's death seemed suspicious enough to call the F.B.I.
episodes.title: Hunter's Target
